channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump attracts America's billionaires to bankroll policies and projects
item.description: President Trump loves billionaires, and they seemingly love him, too. America's wealthiest have all but lined up to fund the president's pet projects ...

item.title: 'Nothing really happens': Lawmakers frustrated about inaction on kids' online safety bills
item.description: Lawmakers are tired of teaming up on bipartisan bills to protect kids online, only to have the broadly supported measures languish.

item.title: Without George Washington, America Wouldn’t Have A 250th Birthday
item.description: No one looms larger in the story of our nation's struggle for independence than George Washington, who today seems almost mythical.

item.title: It’s Not Just Minnesota. The Vast Majority Of Daycare Is A Scam
item.description: Taxpayers have spent hundreds of billions more on completely ineffective daycare than even Somalis have been able to pilfer.

item.title: An Exorbitant Burden
item.description: Not today, but tomorrow, Uncle Sam is broke. Point the blame at fiat currency.

item.title: Trump administration ends lease for three golf courses in the District
item.description: The Trump administration has ended the lease agreement with the National Links Trust for three golf courses in the District.

item.title: When New Art’s Really Old: From the Valley of the Kings to Pompeii to a Rubens in a Paris Closet
item.description: Some of 2025’s biggest art discoveries, plus the Swamp art scene spills into 2026.

item.title: What the Debates over American Heritage Are Really About
item.description: The wars that someone’s ancestors fought in are beside the point.

item.title: Meta's new AI privacy policy allows targeted ads, possibly political ads, based on chats with bots
item.description: Some Instagram users may start seeing that political advertisements mirror what they say and search on the social media platform.

item.title: A year after DOGE, the cuts keep coming
item.description: The Department of Government Efficiency hasn't come close to achieving the $1 trillion in cuts pledged at its launch last January but it has rooted ou...

item.title: The Trump Administration Should Articulate and Defend Its Tariff Game Plan
item.description: The team has approached its most distinctive economic policy in a way that maximizes its ability to negotiate, but not its ability to play defense.

item.title: A Syllabus of Conservative Thought
item.description: My crash course, in seven units.

item.title: Here Are The 10 Biggest Media Hoaxes Of 2025
item.description: In no particular order, here are the biggest hoaxes run by our truth-deprived media throughout the past year.

item.title: The Federalist Staff’s 2025 Winners And Losers Of The Year
item.description: From winners like J.D. Vance and DOGE to losers like Jake Tapper and (also) DOGE, here are The Federalist Staff's picks for 2025.

item.title: Before You Make Any Lofty New Year’s Resolutions, Go Clean Your Room
item.description: Before deciding on any big changes in 2026, try starting with the bedroom.
